title: About US
text: We use professional state of-the-art techniques specializing in the marketing, listing and selling of new and resale luxury homes, residential communities, home sites and investment opportunities.

section.title: How would it help you?
section.content: We maintain a full-time staff of well-trained real estate professionals who continually strive to provide top quality service for their individual clients and customers.

section.title: Why us?
section.content: Nested Homes is a creative, innovative and people-oriented organization providing individual opportunity, personal satisfaction and rewarding challenges to all members of the firm.
